text: Glenn William "GT" Thompson Jr. (born July 27, 1959) is an American politician who has been a member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Pennsylvania since 2009. He is a member of the Republican Party.Chuck Biedka, Democrats in 15th Congressional District primary focus on broadband expansion , Trib Live Since 2023, he has chaired the House Agriculture Committee. Thompson became the dean of the Pennsylvania's Congressional delegation in 2025 following the defeat of Senator Bob Casey Jr. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Congressman Glenn Thompson official U.S. House website * Friends of Glenn Thompson campaign website * * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Glenn Thompson (politician)
